body:
Hey @saljam, this one is also being difficult, if you do indeed like pain.

See https://go-review.googlesource.com/4960 for my attempts thus far. Note that if you run qemu without "-curses" mode, you see more kernel output. The problem seems to be that networking never comes up on Ubuntu Trusty.  (we use Trusty instead of Debian Wheezy because nacl's sel_ldr needs a newer libc... but if sid works now from #9873, perhaps we should just use that image instead of trusty)
